summary: electronic supplementary material available to authorized users. online version of this article (10.1007/s00705-018-3706-0) contains supplementary material. RT-PCR products (A and C) were resolved in 1.5% TAE agarose gels stained with EZ Blue dye. CT-RT-LAMP (B and D) products were visualized under UV light. for RT-PCR were YMV-F3x and YMV-B3x Supplementary material 5 (DOCX 15 kb)
